*

Assman

Jul 19, 2015

Upon entering the hotel room Kramer was shocked to find the marble dildo in the hand of the investigator. The latter buried himself under the sheets as Kramer grabbed them. He stepped out of the room and shut the door, began walking down the hall. Running now. The sheets stretching endlessly behind him towards the hotel room. Running. A long white banner stretching across the sand as Kramer made his way into the dark sea.
